segments.text: Good morning , sir . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I want to deposit 1000 Yuan in my bank account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please fill out this deposit form , first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK ... Here you are . Any problem on that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , that's fine . Do you bring your bankbook with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do . Here it is , and the cash .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything else I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Can you tell me what the interest rate is now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The deposit rate is 0.8 % every month .
segments.speaker: S1
